See here for the conversation hour schedule and more details! All Conversation Hours in GH 308 are free open to the public.      For Instructors  Learn about how LCLC can help you with your teaching and events! We offer all sorts of technology help, workshops, and professional development. See details here!      Contact Us  Do you want to schedule an event in the Language Oasis? Do you need help with a technology tool or want to schedule a workshop? Contact us with any questions you may have!      Today's Events  See what Conversations Hours, Film Series, and special events are happening today in GH 308!
